articles.title: Nontoxic nanosystem powder uses sunlight to quickly disinfect contaminated drinking water - Nanowerk
articles.description: A low-cost, recyclable powder can kill thousands of waterborne bacteria per second when exposed to sunlight. Scientists say the ultrafast disinfectant could be a revolutionary advance for 2 billion people worldwide without access to safe drinking water.
articles.content:

articles.title: Solar storm threat for Earth continues amid NOAA satellites detecting sunspot decay - HT Tech
